TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RayHitTestParameters extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.HitTestParameters3D
Public NotInheritable Class RayHitTestParameters Inherits HitTestParameters3D

summary.span: 指定沿射线执行的命中测试的参数。

span.span: Specifies the parameters of a hit test along a ray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，该可视层支持对某个点或几何图形下的所有对象（而不仅仅是最顶层的对象）进行命中测试。Note that the visual layer supports hit testing against all objects under a point or geometry, not just the topmost object. 2D 命中测试还将直接返回在指定点或几何图形下的三维结果。A 2D hit test will also return 3D results directly under the specified point or geometry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D origin, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D direction) cil managed

span.span: Point3D at which the ray originates.
Vector3D that indicates the direction of the ray.

summary.span: 创建一个对象实例，该对象指定沿其进行命中测试的射线的起点和方向。

span.span: Creates an instance of the object that specifies the origin and direction of the ray along which to hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，该可视层支持对某个点或几何图形下的所有对象（而不仅仅是最顶层的对象）进行命中测试。Note that the visual layer supports hit testing against all objects under a point or geometry, not just the topmost object. 2D 命中测试还将直接返回在指定点或几何图形下的三维结果。A 2D hit test will also return 3D results directly under the specified point or geometry.
